item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 12, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Mark Klein, AT&T whistleblower who revealed NSA mass spying, has died (169 points | 20 comments)
2. Iconography of the PuTTY tools (81 points | 13 comments)
3. Gemini Robotics (500 points | 325 comments)
4. Show HN: Time Portal – Get dropped into history, guess where you landed (69 points | 32 comments)
5. The DuckDB Local UI (532 points | 127 comments)
6. The Night Watch (2013) [pdf] (20 points | 7 comments)
7. Reverse engineering OpenAI code execution to make it run C and JavaScript (150 points | 46 comments)
8. Shenmue (1999) reverse engineering reveals possible sun position oversight (83 points | 29 comments)
9. Zinc, a systems programming language prototype (33 points | 9 comments)
10. Switching from Pyenv to Uv (48 points | 27 comments)
11. The cultural divide between mathematics and AI (121 points | 63 comments)
12. Intel appoints Lip-Bu Tan as its CEO (100 points | 18 comments)
13. Peer-to-peer file transfers in the browser (362 points | 192 comments)
14. I Built a Mechanical Calculator [video] (10 points | 2 comments)
15. Parnassus plays (8 points | 1 comment)
16. Artie (YC S23) Is Hiring Engineer #3 ( | hide)
17. Constant-Time Code: The Pessimist Case [pdf] (58 points | 52 comments)
18. Tell Mozilla: it's time to ditch Google (97 points | 136 comments)
19. The Future Is Niri (290 points | 135 comments)
20. Building websites with lots of little HTML pages (87 points | 34 comments)
21. The insecurity of telecom stacks in the wake of Salt Typhoon (235 points | 144 comments)
22. Open-UI: Maintain an open standard for UI and promote its adherence and adoption (258 points | 83 comments)
23. First ammonia-fueled ship hits a snag (112 points | 184 comments)
24. Inline Evaluation Adventure (23 points | 8 comments)
25. Apple has locked me in the same cage Microsoft's built for Windows 10 users (47 points | 40 comments)
26. Gemma 3 Technical Report [pdf] (375 points | 206 comments)
27. Chris Moore, illustrator for classic sci-fi books, has died (16 points | 1 comment)
28. I stopped everything and started writing C again (202 points | 213 comments)
29. Experiment with Gemini 2.0 Flash native image generation (34 points | discuss)
30. The Startup CTO's Handbook (536 points | 181 comments)
